required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Randomized, Placebo-Controlled, Double-Blind, Parallel-Group, Multi-Site Phase 2b Clinical Study
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Placebo-Controlled, Double-Blind, Parallel-Group, Multi- Site Phase 2b Clinical Study to Assess the Efficacy, Safety and Tolerability Patients With Mild to Moderate Onychomycosis

brief_summary.textblock: A Randomized, Placebo-Controlled, Double-Blind, Parallel-Group, Multi- Site Phase 2b Clinical Study to Assess the Efficacy, Safety and Tolerability of 8-Week Regimens of NVXT topical product in Patients with Mild to Moderate Onychomycosis

detailed_description.textblock: Evaluate safety and tolerability of the two regimens of NVXT (Treatment Groups A and B) in patients with mild to moderate distal subungual onychomycosis of the target toenail.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Patients in Each Treatment Group With a Complete Therapeutic Cure
primary_outcome.description: Complete therapeutic cure is defined as both complete clinical and mycological cure of the target toenail

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Patients in Each Treatment Group With a Complete Therapeutic Cure
primary_outcome.description: Complete therapeutic cure is defined as both complete clinical and mycological cure of the target toenail

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Patients in Each Treatment Group With a Complete or Almost Complete Therapeutic Cure
secondary_outcome.description: Almost complete therapeutic cure is defined as both mycological and satisfactory clinical cure of the target toenail

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Patients in Each Treatment Group With a Complete or Almost Complete Therapeutic Cure
secondary_outcome.description: Almost complete therapeutic cure is defined as both mycological and satisfactory clinical cure of the target toenail

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Patients in Each Treatment Group With a Mycological Cure
secondary_outcome.description: Mycological cure is defined as a negative KOH test and a negative fungal culture.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Patients in Each Treatment Group With a Mycological Cure
secondary_outcome.description: Mycological cure is defined as a negative KOH test and a negative fungal culture.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Patients in Each Treatment Group With a Complete Clinical Cure
secondary_outcome.description: Complete clinical cure is defined as 0% nail involvement.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Patients in Each Treatment Group With a Complete Clinical Cure
secondary_outcome.description: Complete clinical cure is defined as 0% nail involvement.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Patients in Each Treatment Group With a Complete Clinical Cure
secondary_outcome.description: Complete clinical cure is defined as 0% nail involvement.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Patients in Each Treatment Group With a Satisfactory Clinical Cure
secondary_outcome.description: Satisfactory clinical cure is defined as <5% of the target toenail involvement.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Patients in Each Treatment Group With a Satisfactory Clinical Cure
secondary_outcome.description: Satisfactory clinical cure is defined as <5% of the target toenail involvement.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Patients in Each Treatment Group With a Satisfactory Clinical Cure
secondary_outcome.description: Satisfactory clinical cure is defined as <5% of the target toenail involvement.

arm_group.description: daily dosing for one 8-week treatment period (Treatment Group A) and two 8-week treatment periods separated by a 32-week rest period (Treatment Group B),
two 8-week treatment periods separated by a 32-week rest period (Treatment Group C),

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Clinical diagnosis of onychomycosis of the target toenail (defined as one of the infected great toenails).
Exclusion Criteria:
- Females who are pregnant, lactating or likely to become pregnant during the study.

group.description: daily dosing for one 8-week treatment period NVXT topical: topical treatment

group.title: Total
group.description: Total of all reporting groups

category.title: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander

outcome.title: Number of Patients in Each Treatment Group With a Complete Therapeutic Cure
outcome.description: Complete therapeutic cure is defined as both complete clinical and mycological cure of the target toenail
outcome.population: 1 Subject from Group B and 1 Subject from Group C were excluded from Efficacy Analysis because they did not have positive mycological culture screenings. Also, 12 subjects from Group A, 13 from Group B, and 14 from Group C were excluded because they had no efficacy data for the relevant analysis.

group.description: daily dosing for one 8-week treatment period NVXT topical: topical treatment

group.title: NVXT Topical Treatment Group B
group.description: daily dosing for two 8-week treatment periods separated by a 32-week rest period NVXT topical: topical treatment

group.title: Placebo (Vehicle) Topical Treatment Group C
group.description: two 8-week treatment periods separated by a 32-week rest period Placebo (Vehicle) Topical: Placebo (Vehicle) Topical

measure.title: Number of Patients in Each Treatment Group With a Complete Therapeutic Cure
measure.description: Complete therapeutic cure is defined as both complete clinical and mycological cure of the target toenail
measure.population: 1 Subject from Group B and 1 Subject from Group C were excluded from Efficacy Analysis because they did not have positive mycological culture screenings. Also, 12 subjects from Group A, 13 from Group B, and 14 from Group C were excluded because they had no efficacy data for the relevant analysis.

outcome.title: Number of Patients in Each Treatment Group With a Complete Therapeutic Cure
outcome.description: Complete therapeutic cure is defined as both complete clinical and mycological cure of the target toenail
outcome.population: Groups A and B were combined to compare against Group C to determine statistically significant difference when combining both groups that received test treatment in the first 56 Days vs only placebo. 19 subjects from Group A+B and 9 from Group C were excluded because they had no efficacy data or they lacked positive mycological cultures.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There IS an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.
